mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ucare.user(id, password, name, gender, ssn, email, address, tel_no, role, status, remark, birth) VALUES( #{id }, #{password }, #{name }, #{gender }, #{ssn }, #{email }, #{address }, #{telNo }, #{role }, 'true', #{remark }, null )
mapper.select: SELECT name, password, tel_no AS telNo, split_part(email, '@', 1) as emailId, split_part(email, '@', 2) as email, address, birth FROM ucare.user WHERE id = #{id }

choose.when: UPDATE ucare.user SET name = #{name }, tel_no = #{telNo }, email = #{email }, address = #{address }, WHERE id = #{id }
choose.otherwise: UPDATE ucare.user SET name = #{name }, password = #{password }, tel_no = #{telNo }, email = #{email }, address = #{address }, WHERE id = #{id }
